text: Allaha balabenah tomadera purbe jina o manabera yesaba sampradaya cale geche, tadera sathe tomara'o doyakhe ya'o. Yakhana eka sampradaya prabesa karabe; takhana an'ya sampradayake abhisampata karabe. Emanaki, yakhana tate saba'i patita habe, takhana parabartira purbabartidera samparke balabeh he amadera pratipalaka era'i amaderake bipathagami karechila. Ata'eba, apani taderake dbiguna sasti dina. Allaha balabena pratyekera'i dbiguna; tomara jana na.
